sentences.en: A good joke does not necessarily evoke a hearty laugh.
sentences.cn: 真正的笑话不一定能认人会心一笑.

sentences.en: Any requirement that may be construed as'compulsory'will evoke some rebelliousness.
sentences.cn: 任何可以解释成 “ 必须做的”要求都会激起一些反动情绪.

sentences.en: Brand AudIt'shows that Panodol , Tylenol , and Bufferin evoke different association.
sentences.cn: 品牌检验显示, 必理通, 泰诺和百服宁有截然不同的品牌联想.

sentences.en: He could evoke her face at will.
sentences.cn: 他随便什么时候都能回想起她的模样来.

sentences.en: He knew himself able to evoke laughter as well as tears and shudders.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己既能催人落泪和颤抖,也能逗人发笑.

sentences.en: He was an enthusiast himself and loved to evoke enthusiasm in others.
sentences.cn: 他本人就是个热心肠的人,乐意唤起他人的热情.

sentences.en: Her only resource was the sympathy she could evoke.
sentences.cn: 她以凭借的唯一力量就是她能从人们心底里激起的同情.

sentences.en: Her speech evoked a hostile response.
sentences.cn: 她的讲话引起了敌对的反应。

sentences.en: His appearance is bound to evoke sympathy.
sentences.cn: 他的外表肯定会引起人们的同情。

sentences.en: Pieces of fine art may evoke emotional or spiritual responses in us.
sentences.cn: 一件件精美的艺术品可以唤起我们情感和精神上的响应.

sentences.en: Still, picturing the jeers her old padded jacket would evoke, she couldn't restrain her tears.
sentences.cn: 同时, 她的想像中就展开了那件旧棉袄惹人讪笑的情形, 她忍不住哭起来了.

sentences.en: Such an ascent is enough to evoke concerns — both paranoid and justified.
sentences.cn: 公司地位的这般跃升足以引发人们偏执而又合理的忧虑.

sentences.en: The photographs evoked strong memories of our holidays in France.
sentences.cn: 那些照片勾起了我们到法国度假的深刻回忆。

sentences.en: These images are likely to evoke a strong response in the viewer.
sentences.cn: 这些图像可能会在观众中产生强烈反响.

sentences.en: They evoke no ardor in the male breast.
sentences.cn: 它激不起男人胸中的热情.

sentences.en: We must - whatever strategies we evoke - keep those enemies the point of our attack.
sentences.cn: 不管我们开展什么样的战略,我们都必须把这些敌人作为我们的打击对象.

sentences.en: We will be gratified if our efforts evoke your enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 如果我们的努力能引起您的共鸣,这是我们最大的心愿.

sentences.en: Why the reminiscence should evoke such a strong emotion I do not understand.
sentences.cn: 我自己也不明白,为什么会起这么深浓的情绪?

trans.tran_en: to produce a strong feeling or memory in someone

trans.tran_cn: 唤起， 引起， 使人想起
trans.tran_en: to produce a strong feeling or memory in someone
